New_Haven.Lillian Goldman Law Library: The Lillian Goldman Law Library in Memory of Sol Goldman, commonly known as the Yale Law Library, is the law library of Yale Law School. It is located in the Sterling Law Building and has almost 800,000 volumes of print materials and about 10,000 active serial titles, in which there are 200,000 volumes of foreign and international law materials. The library was named after a USD $20 million donation made by Lillian Goldman, widow of real estate magnate Sol Goldman.
